speaker: Lava Chasm
line: Heat rises in slow waves. The air shimmers until distance becomes suspicion. Far below, molten light writes the same sentence again and again: everything ends.

speaker: Avatar of Regret
line: I want you to stop pretending your hands were forced. The world offers pressure. You choose the shape you become under it.

speaker: Avatar of Regret
line: Denial is a second wound. You don’t feel it yet because you’re still bleeding from the first.

speaker: Lava Chasm
line: The heat does not judge you. That is the most frightening kind of honesty.
